field.label: Custom IP Addresses and Configured Firewall Aliases
IPs or Aliases
field.help: Enter as many IP addresses or alias names as desired. Enter ONLY an IP address, IP subnet or alias name! Do NOT enter a FQDN (fully qualified domain name) directly! To use a FQDN, first create the necessary firewall alias, and then provide the alias name here. FQDN aliases are periodically re-resolved and updated by the firewall. You can also provide an IP subnet with a proper netmask of the form network/mask such as 1.2.3.0/24.
